text: OK, Facebook has cut me off. Still, I'm here!!!!
author: tomraum

text: Fun while it lasted. #My4WordObituary
author: tomraum

text: Fun while it lasted.
author: tomraum

text: Which one of you was doing most of the talking? You or your dog?
author: tomraum

text: How to make money in a Trump economy. Any suggestions? We have both Wal-Mart and American Express. They both seem to be doing well.  Jeeze.
author: tomraum

text: Trump. We'll see how markets preform. Oh well. I'm still glad that NPR still repeats "Car Talk" every Saturday night, even it's ages old.
author: tomraum

text: First presidential race I haven't had to cover since pre-Jimmy Carter. Oh well. I still have opinions. And I'll share them here.
author: tomraum

text: Somewhat sad, but mostly glad, I don't have to cover Trump for AP!
author: tomraum

text: Mostly glad and somewhat sad I don't have to cover Trump for AP!
author: tomraum

text: I'm enjoying your stories! Now retired, I used to write politics and economic stuff for AP -- for many decades!
author: tomraum

text: @bykowicz Nice post!
author: tomraum

text: @bykowicz  I enjoy your posts! I did politics and economics for AP for many decades, first in Florida and then for years in D.C.
author: tomraum

text: OK. I've surrendered. I've decided to follow Donald Trump on Twitter. He tweets at 5 am sometimes. I sadly appreciate that.
author: tomraum

text: Obama is easing rules on U.S.-Cuba trade and travel. Hey, it's long overdue! I spent many years in Tampa, with its large Cuban community!
author: tomraum

text: @business Rewriting the tax code has ALWAYS been a slow slog
author: tomraum

text: Hey, say what you want about Trump. He does seem to have a knack for building things. Not an endorsement! My wife & friends know how I vote!
author: tomraum

text: A little worried about the report in the WSJ today that Apple is "working to bolster encryption." Hell, I want people to see what I write!
author: tomraum

text: Glad the Dow FINALLY turned positive for the year. Jeeze.
author: tomraum

text: @markknoller  Well, but doesn't it keep going up under all administrations, both Republican and Democratic?
author: tomraum

text: @tomraum Actually, Yellen also suggested the Fed would act only if there was evidence of strong economic growth. That may not happen.
author: tomraum
